ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] intoleranceConditionEntry, where its type is Intolerance Condition Entry

Contains exactly one [1..1] relatedIntoleranceCategory with data type Code
Indicates how the "Related Intolerance Condition" is related to the original "Intolerance Condition". Examples include "replaces", "replaced by", "parent", "child", etc.
